Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett predicts the Milwaukee Brewers to win, citing Freddy Peralta's recent performance and the team's need to improve at the plate.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the first installment in a three-game series between the St. Louis Cardinals and the Milwaukee Brewers.
The Cardinals split their weekend set against the New York Yankees, while the Brewers won three of their last four games against the Cincinnati Reds.
Others: The betting odds are Milwaukee Brewers -161 / St. Louis Cardinals +135, and the game will be played at American Family Field on Monday at 2:10 pm.
